headline: All You Need to Know About Tapestry (TPR) Rating Upgrade to Strong Buy
summary: Tapestry (TPR) might move higher on growing optimism about its earnings prospects, which is reflected by its upgrade to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy).

headline: Tapestry, Inc. Releases FY2024 Corporate Responsibility Report
summary: NEW YORK, December 18, 2024--Tapestry, Inc. (NYSE: TPR), a house of iconic accessories and lifestyle brands consisting of Coach, Kate Spade, and Stuart Weitzman, today released its Fiscal Year 2024 (FY2024) Corporate Responsibility (CR) report. The report details the company’s progress and achievements in sustainability, social impact and community building over the past year. The company’s framework, The Fabric of Change, encapsulates its vision for a better-made future.
